Generate 40 high-quality flashcards on 'Remote Access VPN Termination' (focus: revoking VPN access during personnel offboarding, not just technical tunnel endpoints; align with hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Personnel Security > Personnel Termination and Offboarding > Access Revocation > Remote Access VPN Termination). Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: Inspire questions that prep for [INSERT ACTIVE COMPONENTS BRIEFLY: discussion on automation, peer teaching on steps, problem-solving breaches]. - Scaffolding: Distribute evenly across 4 layers [INSERT FULL LAYER DESCRIPTIONS]. - Schema: Strictly follow [INSERT FULL FLASHCARD SCHEMA]. Use distractor protocol rigorously. Key Context from Research/Voters: - Emphasize offboarding revocation risks (adversary exploitation of lingering access). - Standards: NIST SP 800-53 (PS-4 Personnel Termination, AC-2 Account Mgmt), NIST SP 800-46 Rev 2 (remote access security), defense.gov CSI VPN hardening PDF. - Distinguish: 'VPN termination point' (gateway) vs. 'access termination' (revocation). Output ONLY as JSON array of flashcards: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'references': [...], 'related_objective': '...', 'layer': 1, 'bloom_level': 'Remember'}}, ...]. Ensure accuracy, no fabrication, comprehensive coverage.
